channel.title: -2 at weapons
channel.description:
Does someone know how to fix this bug, cuz it's mostly at the shortbows and normal bows like crystal bow. Nothing is wrong with the item.cfg it's just not working and I have no idea how to fix it look: At other items it's just normal.
[img]http://img130.imageshack.us/img130/1007/bughj.jpg[/img]

item.title: -2 at weapons
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

[quote=“wwe4eva, post:4, topic:319790”]ermmm, it wont be in client.java because it has nothing to do with items.

Try your item.cfg and make sure it is Magic_bow not magic bow. Sometimes that does it. And just check your class8. It may be that[/quote]
This is not a Delta… If I use another SERVER with the same client I get no problem so it’s serverside…

Read full topic
